mapper.select: select * from tb_daily_record order by edu_time desc
mapper.update: update tb_daily_record set edu_name = #{edu_name}, user_id = #{user_id}, edu_headcount = #{edu_headcount}, edu_subject = #{edu_subject}, edu_content = #{edu_content}, edu_etc = #{edu_etc} where record_idx = #{record_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_daily_record ( edu_name, user_id, edu_headcount, edu_subject, edu_content, edu_photo, edu_time, edu_etc, class_idx) values ( #{edu_name}, #{user_id}, #{edu_headcount}, #{edu_subject}, #{edu_content}, 'edu_photo', SYSDATE, #{edu_etc}, #{class_idx})
